explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting on a chair in the living room, wearing a red shirt and white socks. The living room walls are white. There's a closet on the man's left, containing books and photo frames. He looks up towards his right hand. On the left side, there is a lamp and a black switch with wires connected on both sides.
